pages.text: $(li)The Campfires are a block that it can be used to cook food.$(br)$(li)They can be used to pacify angry Bees too.

$(li)To use it, first you have to place the Campfire.$(br)$(li)Now, to fire it on, right click on the Campfire while you are holding a Flint and Steel on your hand.$(br)$(li)Finally just place your cookable food right clicking on the Campfire while you are holding it.$(br)$(li)In a few seconds, the food will be cook and drop like an item into the ground.

$(li)Unlike the Furnaces, the Campfire doesn't need any kind of Fuel.$(br)$(li)Be careful, if you are on a Campfire, you will receive damage.$(br)$(li)You can turn off the Campfire, right clicking on them with a Water Bucket.$(br)$(li)There are four different versions of the Campfire.
